titles.title: A resolution expressing the sense of the Senate that comprehensive tax reform legislation should include incentives for companies to repatriate foreign earnings for the purpose of creating new jobs.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 1/25/2011--Introduced. Expresses the sense of the Senate that innovative proposals to create new American jobs, such as repatriation, should be considered in the 112th Congress as part of comprehensive tax reform.
